official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Jacksonville Harbor, Florida, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to improve navigation in Mill Cove, Jacksonville Harbor, Florida.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project for Jacksonville Harbor, Florida, to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to improve circulation in, and small boat navigability of, Mill Cove, Jacksonville Harbor, Florida.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Jacksonville Harbor, Florida, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to improve navigation in Mill Cove, Jacksonville Harbor, Florida.
